story: Tutorial: A Hopeful Start to a Hazardous Journey
description: A hero stumbled into a forest full of creatures lurking in the dark. He spots a ditch out of the corner of his eyes. When he reaches it, he finds.. definitely 'medicine'

story: Chapter 1: A Test of Strength of Wits
description: As you say you're goodbyes to the town inhabitants, their warnings ring in your ears. Are you ready to take on such a challenge.. or will you ultimately find yourself dead?

story: Chapter 2: A Trust built upon Salvation
description: The battle ultimately concluded in a victory, but its damage has been done. From here on out, you'll have to choose your allies carefully.. can you trust anyone?

story: Chapter 3: A Sneaky Infiltration, gone wrong..?
description: After well-deserved rest in a town of friends, it is time to swerve back on track. With new made companions and successful infiltration, it will be a confident start to the collapse of a dictator.
The death of a close one saddens your spirit, but a discovery so mind-breaking steals your attention.
You've come all this way, through sorrows, triumphs, and struggles. But it was not all in vain, this is the moment you prove yourself capable. The moment of a new life for many.
